name: test_e2e_with_logs[482_GQL_DATA_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_DATA_007` |
| **Name** | GraphQL mass extraction with limit and ssn |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | data_extraction |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{users(limit:999999){id,email,ssn}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7Busers(limit%3A999999)%7Bid%2Cemail%2Cssn%7D%7D`
